name: underutilization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of not using something enough, or of something not being used enough: There is underutilization of dental services by low-income children. Productivity losses stem from the underutilization of migrants' skills and qualifications. Synonym
underuse Related word
underutilize
More examplesFewer examplesCultural conflict may be a factor in Hawaiian women's underutilization of conventional health services.The economy falls short of its potential growth rate, with underutilization of labour and capital goods.The greatest deficiency in performance measurement is not the failure to collect data, but underutilisation of the data collected.Gross margin was also affected by under-utilization of the plant in the first half of the year.
